narrative.title: Western Desert Force - 1940Q2
narrative.situation: British Corps deployed in North Africa during 1940Q2.
narrative.objectives: Corps-level command for mobile desert warfare - defense of Egypt against Italian invasion from Libya
narrative.axis_objective: Hold current positions and prevent Allied breakthrough.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and neutralize Axis defensive positions.

weather.terrain: Coastal desert and rocky plateau (Egyptian-Libyan border region)

air_support.note: No theater air summary available for this quarter

special_rules: Extended desert operations with long supply lines
Mobile defense using armoured reconnaissance screen
Coordination of British and Commonwealth forces

environment.terrain_type: Coastal desert and rocky plateau (Egyptian-Libyan border region)
